WorkItem.Description:
If you setup a change listener on the backingfld, plug in rateit with it pointing to the backingfld, and you select a star, the value of the backingfld is changed, but the change listener never triggers.

I recommend, after setting the backingfld value, you also manaully trigger a change, e.g.

```
$(itemdata('backingfld')).val(value);
$(itemdata('backingfld')).trigger('change');
```

I've made this addition to rateit locally and it's working much better.
WorkItem.Summary: Trigger change on backingfld when value changes

Comments.Message: Resolved with changeset 35939: Trigger change event on backingfield
Thanks for posting the bug report. As you can see, I've updated the project.
